go_data.term: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
go_data.justification: TGF-beta1 is involved in the TGF-beta1/Smad2/3 signalling pathway.
Ang-II can stimulate NADPH oxidases 2 (Nox2) activity through the TGF-beta1 pathway.
TGF-beta1 plays an important role in atrial fibrosis-associated with the heart failure models of AF.
TGF-beta1 is a secreted protein that signals through cell surface receptors.
TGF-beta1 is a growth factor that regulates cell growth and differentiation.
